titleStmt.title: The holy & great indulgence & pardon of plenary remissio[n] a pena et culpa grau[n]ted by dyuerse popes, & newly confirmed with many amplycacions of our most holy father godes vycar vpo[n] erth pope Leo the .x. ...
titleStmt.author: Franciscan Convent (Ipswich, England)
Catholic Church. aut

notesStmt.note: Appointment by Archbishop of Canterbury (really of York? as he is also called papal legate) as a house where the indulgences granted to the Hospital of the Holy Ghost, Rome, could be gained--STC.
Identified as STC 15475 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
